definitions.definition: recognize or treat (someone or something) as different.
examples: the child is perfectly capable of distinguishing reality from fantasy
synonyms: tell the difference between "distinguishing reality from fantasy"

definitions.definition: perceive or point out a difference.
examples: bees are unable to distinguish between red, black, and various grays
it was too dark to distinguish anything more than their vague shapes
synonyms: espy "he could distinguish shapes in the dark"

definitions.definition: be an identifying or characteristic mark or property of.
synonyms: characterize "this is what distinguishes history from other disciplines"distinctive
unique "does he have any distinguishing features
such as a scar or a birthmark?"

definitions.definition: make oneself prominent and worthy of respect through one's behavior or achievements.
examples: many distinguished themselves in the fight
synonyms: become famous "she distinguished herself in the air corps"
